mapper.select: select '用户总数' as name,count(1) as value from htt_app_user where blackList=0
select '当日新增用户数' as name,count(1) as value from htt_app_user where blackList=0 and registerDate>=#{lastHour} and registerDate<#{currentTime}

select '当日自邀请新增' as name,count(a.studentPhoneNum) as value from (select * from htt_inviteuser_his where createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime}) a, (select * from htt_app_user where blackList=0 and registerDate>=#{lastHour} and registerDate<#{currentTime}) b where a.studentPhoneNum=b.phoneNum and createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime}
select '阅读文章数' as name,count(distinct primaryKey) as value from htt_read_his where createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime}
select '阅读文章次数' as name,sum(awardCount) as value from htt_read_his where createDate>=#{lastHour} and createDate<#{currentTime}
